mapper.insert: insert into system_log_business ( id, operate_type, operator_id, operator, module, request_arg, response_msg, system_tag, operate_time ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestArg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp() )
